channel.title: Port forward via xfinity gateway router
channel.description:
I have the both tcp and udp on 43594 added into the port forwarding and port tiriggering on the cp; I then turn on no-ip , start up server. and it wont connect, i have port forwarded before but it was via vps which i vps is already port forwarded you just need to unblock the ports you need. this is on windows xp; my vps was windows 2003, i had to disable a lot of services until it finally connected.
so, what am i missing here for the windows xp computer?

item.title: Port forward via xfinity gateway router
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

for the ip address did you use your ipv4 when you portforward?

Read full topic
item.source: Port forward via xfinity gateway router
